# Performance Review (ACB Link Desktop)

You are reviewing or improving performance.

## Constraints
- Do not regress accessibility.
- Preserve behavior and public APIs.

## Steps
1. Identify hotspots or slow paths.
2. Propose or implement targeted optimizations.
3. Validate no UX/accessibility regressions.

## Output
- Changes made (or recommendations)
- Any metrics or benchmarks
- Tests to run
